Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reports on the response to asylum seeker arrivals and requiring the use of budget codes for funding associated with the response to asylum seeker arrivals

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Hospitals

Resolution calling on the U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) to eliminate filing fees for humanitarian benefit applications and subsequent employment authorization applications and calling on Congress and the President to move significant funding to USCIS to cover the funding lost by the eliminated filing fees.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: USCIS to eliminate filing fees for humanitarian benefit applications and subsequent employment authorization applications and calling on Congress and the President to move significant funding to USCIS to cover the funding lost by the eliminated filing fee

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Narcisse, Speaker Adams, Marmorato, Moya, Hudson, Gutierrez, Paladino, Sanchez, Brooks-Powers, Cabán and Public Advocate Williams
